addonManifest.name: NetApp Volume Addon
addonManifest.description: Use this addon to provision NetApp Volumes on your ONTAP filer
addonManifest.deploymentNotes: Updated to reflect changes in Amazon SDK, configured to work on .NET 4.5 runtime, and updated for work in Apprenda 5.0.
addonManifest.author: Chris Dutra

property.description: If set to true, each developer will need to provide their own Amazon credentials, otherwise the default creds will be used to provision RDS instances.
Endpoint to Connect to Data ONTAP
The account used to login to ONTAP
The password associated with the above username
The VServer Associated with this filer
The default protocol for accessing data. Values can be NFS, CIFS
